tool.name: VCF to IMa Input
tool.description: Generates an input file for IMa3 from VCF files for each target loci
tool.command: python $__tool_directory__/vcf_to_ima.py --vcfs #for $loci in $vcf_collection: $loci #end for --pop $model_file #if $model_pop != '': --poptag $model_pop #end if --output $output --mutrate $mutrate #if $inhet_cond.inhet_bool --inheritance-scalar $inhet_cond.inheritance #end if #if $reference_genome: --ref $reference_genome $printseq $parsecpg #end if

param.name: parsecpg
param.label: Remove CpGs from loci if reference is provided

param.name: inheritance
param.label: Inheritance Scalar (default 1 for autosomes, .75 for X, .25 for Y/MT)
